# Oakes Fitness

> State of the art personal training studios in Westford & Concord, MA. Founded by Mike Oakes with 25+ years of coaching experience. Oakes Fitness is built on the belief that "movement is medicine" â€” intentional, intelligent training that improves how you move, how you feel, and how you live.

Oakes Fitness offers one-on-one personal training, women's group classes, and youth strength & conditioning for athletes ages 11-16. With two convenient locations in the Greater Boston area, the studio serves clients from Concord, Westford, Bedford, Carlisle, Littleton, Acton, and surrounding communities.

## Pages

- [Home](https://oakesfitness.com/): Overview of services, client testimonials, and studio information
- [Contact / Free Consultation](https://oakesfitness.com/contact.html): Contact form to get started with a free consultation

## Services

- **One on One Coaching**: Personalized 45-minute sessions in private training spaces. Customized workout programs with progress tracking and flexible scheduling.
- **Women's Total Body Conditioning**: High-energy group training sessions focused on full-body strength and conditioning. All fitness levels welcome.
- **Youth Strength & Conditioning**: Safe, age-appropriate training for young athletes ages 11-16. Focus on proper form, athletic foundation, and injury prevention.
- **Coaching for Every Goal**: Weight loss, strength building, athletic performance, post-rehab recovery, and general health and wellness.

## Locations

- **Westford Studio**: 334 Littleton Road, Westford, MA 01886 | Phone: 978-277-6300
- **Concord Studio**: 97a Thoreau Street, Concord, MA 01742 | Phone: 978-680-5069
